replies.body:
_"Banning your synergy then telling your support to ban your main so that if you can't use them no one can"_
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}

You missed the final one.

"Banning your meta one-trick because you're playing another meta champ and you know how cancerous your one-trick is."
How about banning a champion from a different lane to mess with your opponent's picks?
